issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.description: APSHTTPClient should use liberal and consistent logging that follows standard iOS logging practices. It currently uses multiple logging macros in an inconsistent manner. Also the logging is sparse and generally unhelpful.
fields.summary: iOS: APSHTTPClient should use liberal and consistent logging that follows standard iOS logging practices
